articles.summary: The Open Network (TON) has announced a significant change that impacts how users bridge their TON Coin. The Legacy Toncoin Bridge is the core of the TON Network and it will be affected by the new change.   The change will affect all TON coins except the core.

articles.author: The Daily Hodl
articles.summary: Benjamin Cowen believes Bitcoin (BTC) is primed to continue outperforming altcoins over the near term. According to Cowen's social risk metric, altcoins could lose ground to Bitcoin in the near future, based on the social media activity of market participants.

articles.title: Letters: Trump crypto coins and dinner continue the grift
articles.author: The Mercury News
articles.summary: Donald Trump hosted a gala dinner with the president on May 22 at his members-only club. He also has a website with his official $ Trump coin. The website is called Donald Trump's $Trump coin website.   It's a form of payment.

articles.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $95K: A Rally Fuelled by Whale Accumulation and Institutional Inflows
articles.author: NULLTX
articles.summary: Bitcoin has enjoyed a surge, pushing through the $95,000 mark for the first time in two months. Bitcoin's 11.2% price increase has left some bearish traders feeling regret over their decision to sell off their holdings. This recent surge has reignited bullish sentiment all across the market.

articles.title: Bitcoin mining costs soar 47% to $137K in Q4 amid rising input costs, tax liabilities
articles.author: Cryptoslate
articles.summary: The average cost to mine Bitcoin (BTC) increased by 47% in the fourth quarter of 2024 to $82,162 among publicly listed miners. The report pointed out that accelerated hardware deployment, tax expenses, and growing are the main reasons for the increase.

articles.title: How To Price Bitcoin? BlackRock Exec Explains
articles.author: News BTC
articles.summary: Bitcoin should be valued as an uncorrelated asset that benefits when the world gets messier, BlackRock's US Head of Equity ETFs Jay Jacobs told CNBC in an interview on Thursday. 'Crypto over the long run is decoupled from US tech stocks,' he said.

articles.title: Bitcoin Advanced Sentiment Index Signals Strength – Bears Face Risks As Bulls Take Control
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Since Bitcoin reclaimed the $90K level on Tuesday, market sentiment has started to shift dramatically. Bitcoin's strong price recovery is bringing a wave of optimism back into the crypto space. Price action is signaling the potential start of a major recovery rally, with bulls prevailing over bears.

articles.title: Swiss National Bank rejects adding Bitcoin to reserves, cites liquidity and volatility fears
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: The Swiss National Bank rejected the idea of buying Bitcoin on Friday during its shareholder meeting in Bern. The central bank says Bitcoin does not meet the requirements for currency reserves.      Â   .   - Martin Schlegel, the SNB chairman.

articles.title: Ethereum To Hit $5k Before Its 10th Birthday, Justin Sun Says
articles.author: News BTC
articles.summary: Justin Sun, the founder of the Tron blockchain, predicts that the price of Etherum will rise to $5,000 in the next few months. The prediction is made as Etherum is celebrating its 10th anniversary in July 2025. The daring forecast has made waves in cryptocurrency.

articles.title: Solana Acquisition: Massive Potential as DeFi Development Corp. Plans $1B Offering
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: DeFi Development Corp. (formerly known as Janover Inc.) is exploring a financial maneuver that could directly impact the Solana ecosystem. This development is centered around a transaction involving a block chain called Solana, which is one of the world's leading blockchains.
